text: February 16, 2018 / 2:34 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Intel Says 32 Lawsuits Filed Against Co Related To Chip Flaws Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 16 (Reuters) - Intel Corp: * AS OF FEB. 15, 30 CUSTOMER CLASS ACTION LAWSUITS, 2 SECURITIES CLASS ACTION LAWSUITS FILED RELATED TO SPECTRE & MELTDOWN CHIP FLAWS - SEC FILING Source text - ( bit.ly/2EubOUc ) Further company coverage:
